Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/72nd
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 74th, Racine, 69th, Halsted due to street blockage near Halsted/72nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 74th, Racine, 69th, Halsted due to street blockage near Halsted/72nd.

Allow extra travel time.
